job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: <p>We seek an experienced software engineer who can rapidly build, scale, and operate software solutions in a distributed environment. As a member of the Cloud Service Integration team, you will deliver mission critical cloud services used daily by both customers and internal teams. </p><p><br></p><p><strong>Job Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Work with OCI engineering leaders to develop scalable, operationally-focused, customer-facing cloud services.</li><li>Leverage Java service frameworks to rapidly build and deploy applications.</li><li>Use technologies like Kubernetes to operate highly available, high-performance distributed</li><li>systems.</li><li>Automate common tasks to enable continuous delivery and ensure continuous availability</li><li>with minimal human overhead.</li><li>Drive performant, forward-thinking solutions to completion on time.</li><li>Maintain both development and production infrastructure as part of a customer-focused</li><li>engineering culture.</li><li>Provide technical guidance and constructive feedback to leadership, team members, and</li><li>other stakeholders.</li><li>Contribute to product roadmaps by identifying areas of need and engaging with stakeholders</li><li>to scope work.</li><li>Raise the bar for engineering quality and best practices.&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>5+ years of relevant experience.</li><li>Expert in Java.</li><li>Additional skill in one or more of: Javascript/React, Elasticsearch, Redis, Kubernetes, Terraform, network architecture, application security.</li><li>Previous experience developing distributed, fault-tolerant applications.</li><li>Familiarity with several of the following technologies: Infrastructure-as-a-Service (AWS/Azure/Google Cloud), CI/CD systems (TeamCity/Jenkins), Docker, Linux (Oracle Linux/RedHat), RESTful APIs, log analysis tools, debugging tools.</li><li>Strong team player with outstanding communication, organization, and interpersonal skills.</li><li>Comfort with complex, rapidly evolving software development environments.</li><li>Ability to learn new technologies quickly.</li><li>Ability to drive, follow, and evangelize cross-team processes.</li><li>Experience using distributed source code management systems such as Git.</li><li>Experience using ticket tracking systems such as JIRA.</li><li>Experience working with geographically distributed teams.</li><li>Commitment to capturing and maintaining institutional knowledge.</li><li>Significant work experience in startups or fast-paced enterprise technology development environments.</li></ul><li></li>
